# Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

**procurement reference number**: cb-633-9450467
**solicitation number**: 25-269459
**publication date**: 19 November 2024
**tender closing date**: 03 January 2025, 14:00:00
**procurement status**: Open

**procurement overview**:
The Government of Canada is seeking a translation software and support services supplier to meet the requirements of Global Affairs Canada (GAC). The successful supplier will provide an Artificial Intelligence (AI) based translation tool and language technology service for an annual subscription. This service must support up to 2,000 concurrent users, utilizing neural networks and machine learning technology to continually learn language and improve over time.

**desired features and capabilities**:
The translation tool and language technology service must provide highly accurate and natural-sounding translations that are contextually relevant to the original language. The supplier must be able to translate documents quickly and accurately in various languages, supporting the needs of GAC's offices across Canada and 187 missions around the world.

**contract details**:
The contract will be awarded for one (1) year, plus two (2) one (1) year irrevocable options, allowing the Government of Canada to extend the term of the contract. The incumbent supplier is DeepL, with a contract duration from 07 August 2024 to 07 February 2025 and a contract value of $86,970.24.
